name: woozily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you feel weak or ill and unable to think clearly: His eyes opened woozily. She emerged from the rollercoaster somewhat woozily. See
woozy
More examplesFewer examplesHe lay motionless for about 30 seconds before standing up and woozily walking off the field.Michelle stumbles woozily out of bed to be sick in the bathroom.I looked woozily around for Mr and Mrs Gould.
